str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular

str2: A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To yoke together, unite (as man and wife). From sun and the base of zeugos; to yoke together, i.e. conjoin.
A man, one of the human race. From aner and ops; man-faced, i.e. A human being.
Not, lest. A primary particle of qualified negation; not, lest; also (whereas ou expects an affirmative one) whether.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From chora; to place room between, i.e. Part; reflexively, to go away.
